scripts.prepare:optimism: mustache config/optimism.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache config/optimism.json const.template.ts > src/const.ts ; mustache config/optimism.json const.template.ts > src1/const.ts; mustache config/optimism.json const.template.ts > src2/const.ts
scripts.build-contract: solc contracts/Gravity.sol --abi -o abis --overwrite && solc contracts/Gravity.sol --bin -o bin --overwrite
